title: Statue Of Liberty National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery       Social Media and Multimedia Park rangers and park visitors have increasingly used social media to share photographs. On the Statue's official Facebook and Flickr albums, you can view albums, comment on your favorites and even contribute to the collection.   The links below include some of our favorites. While browsing the photographs, Like Us on Facebook and Flickr so you will never miss another update.      Liberty Island Photographs on Facebook    Statue of Liberty Birthday Cards on Facebook    1980s Restoration on Flickr    Historic Photographs on Facebook        Â                 National Park Service Centennial at the Statue of Liberty   4 Photos  As the National Park Service turns 100, parks across the country are helping to celebrate and working toward our Centennial Goal of connecting with and creating the next generation of park visitors, supporters, and advocates. This gallery showcases some of the special Centennial events at the Statue of Liberty leading up to and during 2016.          125 years of the Statue of Liberty   18 Photos  The Statue of Liberty's construction, dedication, restoration, and 2009 re-opening.          Statue of Liberty   25 Photos
